courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and basic music theory.

courses.title: Piano Mastery
courses.description: Master the piano with advanced techniques, improvisation, and classical repertoire.

courses.title: Music Production Essentials
courses.description: Learn how to produce music using software, mix tracks, and create professional-sounding recordings.

courses.title: Singing for Beginners
courses.description: Discover your voice and learn essential singing techniques, breathing exercises, and vocal warm-ups.

courses.title: Drums Workshop
courses.description: Get hands-on with drumming techniques, rhythms, and styles, from rock to jazz.
